page.title: 01LANDSCAPE 1
page.content:
The Survey Block consists mainly of gently undulating farmland with the village of{NORTON IN HALES}being the only populated area of any significance.
Most farming is Dairying,but some field boundaries have been removed to ease the managment of cereal crops.
In the south east corner of the block are several plantations of mixed woodland.
There are several large halls in the area where estate owners used to live. Lots of farms show up on the landscape.
The church tower and several large Scots Pine trees dominate the village skyline.
